sys_script_include.name: Get_Incident_Number

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a4d6a601c353c61037d1b7ddd4013180
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1393996_scriptin.Get_Incident_Number</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Get_Incident_Number</name><script><![CDATA[var Get_Incident_Number = Class.create();
Get_Incident_Number.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getIncidentNumber:function(){

		var incident_reference = this.getParameter('sys_id');

		var incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		obj = {};

		if(incident.get(incident_reference))
		{
			obj.number = incident.getValue("number");
		}
		
		return JSON.stringify(obj);

	},

    type: 'Get_Incident_Number'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-08 08:36:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>a4d6a601c353c61037d1b7ddd4013180</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get_Incident_Number</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Scripting_Training" source="x_1393996_scriptin">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Scripting_Training">36a66608c35b421037d1b7ddd4013181</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a4d6a601c353c61037d1b7ddd4013180</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-08 10:21:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
